name: LISA the Fisrt
description:
Disclaimer: I didn't make this game, this is just a html port/simple way to play it on a browser, and I have no idea if I am allowed to do this.

LISA: THE FIRST is a Yume-Nikki style exploration game. It was made in RPG Maker 2003 and released on October 9th, 2012. It is the predecessor to LISA: THE PAINFUL. It is an exploration of a mind as she tries to cope with the burden of being abused by her father.

Original game by Dingaling
